description: Carry-on luggage is designed to be small enough to bring onto an airplane and stow in the overhead locker. The term encompasses all luggage styles, including suitcases, backpacks, and weekenders.

products.name: Samsonite Freeform Carry-On
products.description: A lightweight, durable carry-on suitcase with expandable capacity.

products.name: Away Carry-On
products.description: Sleek and modern, designed for frequent flyers.

products.name: Briggs & Riley Rhapsody
products.description: Stylish and spacious, this carry-on is perfect for weekend getaways.

products.name: AmazonBasics Softside Carry-On
products.description: Affordable, lightweight softside carry-on with ample storage.
